channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.1.7
item.description:
This is the May 2019 quarterly update for PostgreSQL.

  • PostgreSQL 10.8 with PostGIS 2.4.7
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.13 with PostGIS 2.3.9
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.17 with PostGIS 2.2.8

PostgreSQL 11.3 is available with Postgres.app 2.2.3 and can be download from postgresapp.com/downloads.html
